title: Scammer_Hunter21
author: Scammer_Hunter21
content: Greetings, I am on the hunt for two characters, the Founder of QuadrigaCX and the Founder of Terra-Luna.I have been following Gerald Cotten's trail for months, and it seems that he is still alive, and with my contacts I was able to reach an approximate area in the middle of the ocean, where he has a small hotel by the sea.hahaha it seems that she discreetly enjoys his ill-gotten fortune.And on the other hand, I am hunting down the founder of TERRA-LUNA Do Kwon to make him answer for all the money he made thousands of investors lose. I know that he is not from South Korea and he is not in Singapore either, I have indications that he is in LUBUANI have all my sources and I'm about to post more information on Twitter, I'll tell you the account soon so you can follow the progress of the hunt for these individuals.I am looking for donations and investments for that purpose, it is a risky and lucrative mission.You can contact me through the appSession getsession.org/My ID: 05ad7cbdee181bd2c37fff361f7a291b72ebfdba7420b8886854d07bef31efc53fMonero: 84KHnsx3vpQ4kWPsNUt6aGjTZeQSwuunVZ9K5PBPMezh3bnD5ZRRPsK1K49kz3596cNmFDw2wmXrZ5J pXDfYurP3SUNoyzX
